name: Masked Away
description:
Kokoro is minding her own business, when suddenly a hell raven (Okuu) flies past with one of her masks. Determined to get it back, Kokoro heads out on a journey to find the culprit behind the bird. She’s left with only one kind of mask; an ability stealing blank mask. She’ll use this to copy the powers of elemental enemies she finds along the way, helping her traverse the land.

Controls:

Left/right arrow keys = movement

Space bar = jump

Q, W, E = Attack (high angle, mid range, low angle shots, respectively)
